front.title: Use Cases and Requirements for MPLS-TP multi-failure protection

abstract.t: MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) linear protection is defined in [RFC6378]. That however is limited to 1+1 and 1:1 protection and is not able to care that the multiple failures are occurred on both working and protection paths. This document describes why we need to consider the case for multiple failures, and lists some requirements for multi-failure protection (MFP) functionality.
